overview: Many years after a nuclear war, the human survivors have created a new society where much of the work done by androids, referred to derisively by humans as "clickers".  A police official who is concerned that his sister has become involved with an android is sent to investigate a larger rumor that the androids are developing reason and emotion.
tagline: Man's Own Creation! Can He Control Machines That Produce People?
title: The Creation of the Humanoids
